resources.string:
Hi, my name is First. 

I love sports. 

I also enjoy playing variety of sports. 
My favorite is Basketball. 
Second is Football. 
Third is Baseball. 
Fourth is Soccer. 

I like to workout. 
And sometimes hiking. 
And some outdoor activity. 

I once hit 315lbs on squats. 
Hit 235lbs on bench. 
Hit 245lbs on deadlift 

Once the gyms open again I'll make sure to go to the gym. 
And increase my personal record.
